article.title: Status and history for [deu_1996]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS resolved to U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN.

“des weiteren” corrected to “des Weiteren” and “zuteil werden” corrected to “zuteilwerden”. Deleted an inserted comma that is not obligatory and restored an acceptable comma. Moved “gewährleistet” so that its position corresponds to the OHCHR translation in the PDF version. Thanks to Ivan Panchenko.

Two typos: “Forschritt” corrected to “Fortschritt” and “Staatsanghörigkeit” corrected to “Staatsangehörigkeit”, thanks to Roey Horns. Added two missing commas and removed an extra comma, thanks to Otto Stolz.
“einschließlich” requires the genitive. Thanks to Asmus Freytag.
Stage 4: initial version in provided by Otto Stolz.
